design_overview: Minimalist and natural aesthetic, focusing on clarity, efficiency, and calm productivity.

colors.description: Medium gray for metadata or disabled states

main_view.header: App title 'Simple Tasks', Add Task button (+)
main_view.task_list: Stacked items with checkbox, description, delete icon. Completed tasks are greyed out with strikethrough.
main_view.empty_state: Message like 'All done! Add a new one.' with add button.

modal.content: Input field for task description, Save/Cancel buttons.

ui_flow: App Launch: Displays main TODO List View (or empty state).
Add Task: Click '+' -> Modal/Input appears -> Type task -> Save -> Task appears in list.
View Tasks: Tasks listed, scrollable, completed visually distinct.
Complete Task: Click checkbox -> Task appearance changes, may move to bottom/completed section.
Delete Task: Click delete icon -> Task removed from list.
Edit Task (Optional): Click task/edit icon -> Modal pre-filled -> Modify text -> Save -> Task description updates.
